columnContent.title: Security inefficiency
columnContent.description: More vendors means more tickets and longer timelines.

columnContent.title: Reduced visibility
columnContent.description: Redundant dashboards and alerts create oversights.

columnContent.title: More attacks and breaches
columnContent.description: Inefficiency and reduced visibility cause gaps and slow response.

relatedBlades.title: Simplify security and reduce vendor sprawl with Cloudflare
relatedBlades.copy: The [connectivity cloud](https://www.cloudflare.com/connectivity-cloud/) from Cloudflare offers comprehensive enterprise security via scalable, programmable, cloud-native services, which eliminates the need for multiple security vendors.

imageAssetFile.altText: Simplify your approach and deliver security everywhere with Cloudflare

contentfulAsset.description: Simplify your approach and deliver security everywhere with Cloudflare

columnContent.title: Adopt Zero Trust
columnContent.description: Augment or replace risky VPNs, secure contractor or unmanaged device access, mitigate ransomware attacks, view and reduce data exposure.

columnContent.title: Protect your attack surface
columnContent.description: Prevent multi-channel phishing and business email compromise, protect remote workers and distributed offices, and secure the WAN.

columnContent.title: Stop zero-days
columnContent.description: Stop vulnerability exploits in APIs & web apps (e.g. 0-days, known CVEs, SQLi, XSS etc), along with denial of service and bot attacks.

relatedBlades.htmlContent: Speedier incident response times, reduced cost and faster innovation

relatedBlades.title: Cloudflare's connectivity cloud simplifies and streamlines security consolidation
relatedBlades.description: Our composable platform and network make it easier for organizations to protect their users, apps, and networks, across any endpoint or infrastructure — across the entire attack lifecycle.

columnContent.title: 1. Minimize attack surfaces
columnContent.description: Unite different security domains on a single platform, simplifying management across every attack surface

columnContent.title: 2. Prevent initial compromise
columnContent.description: Block more attacks with peerless threat intelligence spanning every domain

columnContent.title: 3. Eliminate lateral movement
columnContent.description: Detect and respond to threats faster via unified dashboards and reporting

columnContent.title: 4. Stop exfiltration and extortion
columnContent.description: Lock down the whole network with Zero Trust policies

relatedBlades.htmlContent: Cloudflare helps GPC blocks hundreds of millions of attacks across their digital portfolio

content.value:
GPC faced poor threat visibility across their 900+ site web presence, complicating detection and response. In response, they replaced their multi-vendor stack with Cloudflare's web application security services. 

Now, Cloudflare has helped them detect and block as many as 450 million threats per year, and prevent competitive screen scraping.
"When board members see the numbers, they know we're getting a solid return on our Cloudflare investment."

features.title: Carrefour
features.description: Cloudflare's unified security platform slashes Carrefour's incident resolution time by 75%, saving time and money while enhancing the customer experience.

features.title: LendingTree
features.description: Leveraging Cloudflare solutions for DDoS, Bot Management, and Rate Limiting, LendingTree was able to save $250,000 over five months by stopping API endpoint abuse.

features.title: The State of Arizona
features.description: Cloudflare protects offices for 100+ U.S. civilian agencies with DNS filtering.

features.title: Canva
features.description: Cloudflare enables Canva to scale its global operations with solutions for security, access management and serverless.

features.title: Bouvet
features.description: Cloudflare helps Bouvet modernize threat defense across employees and infrastructure.
